channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree blocking sunlight, 27th June
item.description:
This Tree has been reported countless times for blocking sunlight out of my garden & the issue has still not been sorted

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sage Close, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large grass area on the corner of pottersfield and Cranford Close is totally overgrown, 27th June
item.description:
Opposite no 1 and 2 Cranford Close GL52 9QA
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cranford Close, Tewkesbury

item.title: Right turn filter light completely obscured, 27th June
item.description:
Now that the traffic lights have been moved the right turn filter (from CRE on to Pirton Lane) is completely obscured by another sign. It is impossible to see the right turn green filter light when waiting to turn right
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: 30mph sign missing, 27th June
item.description:
Speed Limit sign gone many vehicles driving in excess Of the TRO in relation to the new cycle way on Cheltenham Road East
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 27th June
item.description:
28 day with give and take plus temporary footway closure required lift an replace x1 broken raised 600x600x20mm slab replace with tarmac patch (FW Broken Slabs)
Report on FixMyStreet
